item.title: Around 700 shops gutted as fire ravages Arunachal Pradesh's oldest market
item.description: Around 700 shops gutted as fire ravages Arunachal Pradesh’s oldest market Around 700 shops were reduced to ashes in a massive fire that broke out at Naharlagun Daily Market near Itanagar on Tuesday morning
